location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国广东省
location.en: Guangdong Province, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国广东省的计划单列市，中国四大一线城市之一、粤港澳大湾区的中心城市之一、中国超大城市之一。深圳是中国全国性经济中心、国际科技创新中心和对外开放门户。
description.en: A sub-provincial city in Guangdong Province, People's Republic of China. It is one of the four first-tier cities in China, a central city in the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area, and one of China's megacities. Shenzhen serves as a national economic center, an international technology and innovation hub, and a gateway for foreign relations.

description.zh-cn: 1978年中共十一届三中全会后，中国开始实行的以经济建设为中心、对外开放的国策。
description.en: A national policy of focusing on economic development and opening up to the outside world, initiated by China after the Third Plenary Session of the 11th Central Committee of the CCP in 1978.

description.zh-cn: 深圳市的前身，是历史上长期存在的一个县级行政区划，始立于东晋。
description.en: The predecessor of Shenzhen, a county-level administrative division that existed for a long period, first established in the Eastern Jin Dynasty.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府，是中国的最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China, which is the highest state administrative organ in China.

nodes.id: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家权力机关全国人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The permanent body of the National People's Congress, the highest state power organ of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国设立的第一个经济特区，作为改革开放的试验田，为深圳的早期高速发展提供了政策支持。
description.en: The first Special Economic Zone established in China, serving as a pilot area for reform and opening-up, providing policy support for Shenzhen's early rapid development.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二代中央领导集体的核心人物，中华人民共和国改革开放和现代化建设的总设计师。
description.en: The core figure of the second generation of central leadership of the Communist Party of China, and the chief architect of China's reform and opening-up and modernization drive.

description.zh-cn: 指在1950年代至1970年代末，大批中国大陆居民因政治、经济等原因，经由深圳等地非法越境进入英属香港的群众性偷渡事件。
description.en: Refers to the mass illegal border crossings of mainland Chinese residents, primarily through Shenzhen, into British Hong Kong from the 1950s to the late 1970s due to political and economic reasons.

description.zh-cn: 总部位于香港的中国中央企业，是中国近代史上第一家轮船运输企业。
description.en: A Chinese state-owned enterprise headquartered in Hong Kong, and the first steamship navigation company in modern Chinese history.

description.zh-cn: 由招商局集团于1979年创办，是中国第一个对外开放的工业区，被誉为中国改革开放的“试管”。
description.en: Founded in 1979 by China Merchants Group, it was the first industrial zone in China to open up to the outside world and is known as the 'test tube' of China's reform and opening-up.

description.zh-cn: 招商局集团原常务副董事长，蛇口工业区和招商银行、平安保险等企业的创办者，是深圳经济特区早期的重要开拓者。
description.en: Former executive vice chairman of China Merchants Group, founder of Shekou Industrial Zone and enterprises like China Merchants Bank and Ping An Insurance, and a key pioneer in the early days of the Shenzhen Special Economic Zone.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第一家完全由企业法人持股的股份制商业银行。
description.en: The first joint-stock commercial bank in the People's Republic of China wholly owned by corporate legal entities.

description.zh-cn: 中国第一家股份制保险企业。
description.en: The first joint-stock insurance company in China.

description.zh-cn: 中国大陆两大证券交易所之一，为证券集中交易提供平台。
description.en: One of the two stock exchanges in mainland China, providing a platform for centralized securities trading.

description.zh-cn: 1992年邓小平视察中国南方城市并发表重要讲话的事件，对中国的改革开放进程产生了深远影响。
description.en: An event in 1992 where Deng Xiaoping inspected southern Chinese cities and delivered important speeches, which had a profound impact on China's reform and opening-up process.

description.zh-cn: 深圳光明新区红坳村发生的大规模土石崩塌事故，造成重大人员伤亡和财产损失。
description.en: A large-scale landslide and debris flow accident in Hong'ao Village, Guangming New District, Shenzhen, which caused significant casualties and property damage.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会
en: Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央权力机关。
description.en: The central authority of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国特色社会主义先行示范区

zh-cn: 中国特色社会主义先行示范区
en: Pilot Demonstration Area of Socialism with Chinese Characteristics

description.zh-cn: 中共中央、国务院支持深圳建设的示范区，承担在制度创新、扩大开放等方面先行先试的重要使命。
description.en: A demonstration area supported by the CPC Central Committee and the State Council for Shenzhen to build, undertaking the important mission of piloting institutional innovation and expanding opening-up.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代民主革命的伟大先行者，中华民国和中国国民党的缔造者。
description.en: A great pioneer of the modern democratic revolution in China, and the founder of the Republic of China and the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 1900年孙中山于三洲田村（位于现深圳市境内）一带发动的反清起义。
description.en: An anti-Qing uprising launched by Sun Yat-sen in 1900 in the area of Sanzhoutian Village (located within present-day Shenzhen).

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共广东省委副书记、深圳市委书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently serving as Deputy Secretary of the Guangdong Provincial Committee of the CCP and Secretary of the Shenzhen Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共深圳市委副书记、深圳市人民政府市长。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently serving as Deputy Secretary of the Shenzhen Municipal Committee of the CCP and Mayor of the Shenzhen Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任深圳市人大常委会主任。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently serving as the Director of the Standing Committee of the Shenzhen Municipal People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任深圳市政协主席。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently serving as the Chairwoman of the Shenzhen Municipal Committee of the CPPCC.

nodes.id: 中国共产党深圳市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党深圳市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在深圳市的地方组织和领导核心。
description.en: The local organization and leadership core of the Communist Party of China in Shenzhen.

description.zh-cn: 深圳市的最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ of Shenzhen.

description.zh-cn: 深圳市的国家权力机关。
description.en: The state power organ of Shenzhen.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议深圳市委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议深圳市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议在深圳市的地方组织。
description.en: The local organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference in Shenzhen.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的一个特别行政区，与深圳相邻，两地经济社会联系极为紧密。
description.en: A Special Administrative Region of the People's Republic of China, adjacent to Shenzhen, with extremely close economic and social ties.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 批复同意将宝安县改制为深圳市，正式设立深圳市。
description.en: Approved the restructuring of Bao'an County into Shenzhen City, formally establishing Shenzhen City.

description.zh-cn: 深圳作为改革开放的窗口和试验田，因该国策而实现高速发展。
description.en: As a window and pilot area for the reform and opening-up, Shenzhen achieved rapid development due to this national policy.

relationships.source: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 批准《广东省经济特区条例》，正式在深圳设置中国第一个经济特区。
description.en: Approved the 'Regulations on Special Economic Zones in Guangdong Province', officially establishing China's first special economic zone in Shenzhen.

description.zh-cn: 经济特区的设立和一系列优惠政策极大地推动了深圳市的经济社会发展。
description.en: The establishment of the special economic zone and a series of preferential policies greatly promoted the economic and social development of Shenzhen.

description.zh-cn: 首次视察深圳，肯定了经济特区的发展模式，为特区发展提供了强大的政治支持。
description.en: Inspected Shenzhen for the first time, affirming the development model of the special economic zone and providing strong political support for its development.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平在南巡期间发表重要讲话，拯救了当时处于困境的中国新兴资本市场及深圳证券交易所，使得改革开放重新加速。
description.en: During his Southern Tour, Deng Xiaoping delivered important speeches that saved China's emerging capital market and the Shenzhen Stock Exchange from their predicament, thereby re-accelerating the reform and opening-up.

description.zh-cn: 大规模的逃港事件促使中共高层反思政策，被认为是促成深圳经济特区建立的原因之一。
description.en: The large-scale exodus to Hong Kong prompted top CCP leaders to reflect on their policies and is considered one of the reasons for the establishment of the Shenzhen Special Economic Zone.

description.zh-cn: 招商局承办和开发了蛇口工业区，这是中国内地第一个出口加工工业区。
description.en: China Merchants Group undertook and developed the Shekou Industrial Zone, which was the first export processing industrial zone in mainland China.

description.zh-cn: 在其推动下，中国第一家由企业创办的股份制商业银行——招商银行在深圳蛇口成立。
description.en: Under his promotion, China Merchants Bank, the first joint-stock commercial bank founded by an enterprise in China, was established in Shekou, Shenzhen.

description.zh-cn: 在其推动下，中国第一家由企业创办的商业保险机构——平安保险在深圳蛇口成立。
description.en: Under his promotion, Ping An Insurance, the first commercial insurance institution founded by an enterprise in China, was established in Shekou, Shenzhen.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央委员会
relationships.target: 中国特色社会主义先行示范区

description.zh-cn: 与国务院共同决定支持深圳市建设“中国特色社会主义先行示范区”。
description.en: Jointly with the State Council, decided to support Shenzhen in building a 'Pilot Demonstration Area of Socialism with Chinese Characteristics'.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院
relationships.target: 中国特色社会主义先行示范区

description.zh-cn: 与中共中央共同决定支持深圳市建设“中国特色社会主义先行示范区”。
description.en: Jointly with the CPC Central Committee, decided to support Shenzhen in building a 'Pilot Demonstration Area of Socialism with Chinese Characteristics'.

description.zh-cn: 该事故造成73人死亡、4人失踪，直接经济损失达8.8亿余元人民币，对城市安全和声誉造成了负面影响。
description.en: The accident resulted in 73 deaths, 4 missing persons, and direct economic losses exceeding 880 million RMB, negatively impacting the city's safety and reputation.

description.zh-cn: 于1900年在三洲田村（现深圳境内）一带发动了惠州起义（又称三洲田起义）。
description.en: In 1900, he launched the Huizhou Uprising (also known as the Sanzhoutian Uprising) in the area of Sanzhoutian Village (now within Shenzhen).

relationships.target: 中国共产党深圳市委员会

description.zh-cn: 孟凡利现任中共深圳市委书记。
description.en: Meng Fanli currently serves as the Secretary of the Shenzhen Municipal Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 覃伟中现任深圳市市长。
description.en: Qin Weizhong currently serves as the Mayor of Shenzhen.

description.zh-cn: 戴运龙现任深圳市人大常委会主任。
description.en: Dai Yunlong currently serves as the Director of the Standing Committee of the Shenzhen Municipal People's Congress.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议深圳市委员会

description.zh-cn: 林洁现任深圳市政协主席。
description.en: Lin Jie currently serves as the Chairwoman of the Shenzhen Municipal Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 两地地理相近、经济社会联系紧密，形成了独特的城际关系。香港是深圳最大的贸易伙伴，并在深圳经济特区建立初期输入了大量投资和管理经验，对深圳的早期发展起到了关键推动作用。
description.en: The two places are geographically close with tight economic and social ties, forming a unique inter-city relationship. Hong Kong is Shenzhen's largest trading partner and provided significant investment and management experience during the early days of the Shenzhen SEZ, playing a key role in promoting Shenzhen's early development.
